name: Snowplow Truck Driver simulator 3d game
description:
Drive your truck in this amazing simulation game for iOS!
Heavy snow flurry had blocked the highway roads and streets for traffic mobility.
You can enjoy realistic driving experience with real Scania tractor model on a long motorway.
Gorgeous motor control and enjoy the beautiful moments of each other with air brake systems.

Winter is here and the snow is piling up rapidly. Do your duty: remove the snow and clear the roads!
Take control of a monstrous snow blower around the city and clear the way for other vehicles.
Operate heavy bulldozer crane to break and collect hard ice frozen on the highway so people can drive cars around city.
Lend out a helping hand by making this winter season safe for all!Choose real trucks, to drive in real cities with real names in this elaborate simulation.
Many different trucks to explore the gorgeous landscapes and environments on Truck Simulator 2016.
Ice is a safety hazard to humans and cars alike. Lend out a helping hand by making this winter season safe for all!. Solve the ice problem.
Take control of a monstrous snowflake blower around the city and clear the way for other vehicles. But the challenges don't stop there.
